title: Rengar or Vi?
body: I mainly play in the mid lane and jungle. Jungle is just awesome, and I'm awesome at it. I currently have 6786 IP and I have Yasuo and Vel'Koz. Who should I get?

replies.body:
Vi is more of a lockdown champ with more utility, whereas Rengar has more nuke potential with his triple Q combo. He's also a better counter jg and (arguably) has better ganks. Both end up being fairly tanky.

They both have interesting kits, though I would argue that Rengar's is more versatile. He also comes with the possibility of **The Hunt is On** to trigger :p.  However, it's more difficult to utilize correctly and he takes more time to master.

So what's your pref? I play both, though I prefer Vi...mostly because I'm still not that good at managing Rengar's 'Ferocity'. They're both great picks, especially in the current meta. It really just comes down to playstyle and theme.

I bought {{champion:254}}, one of the best choices I have made.

She has decent sustain in the jungle, her pre-6 gank are great, and her level 6 ganks are almost always guaranteed kills.

She can build one damage item and the rest tank, she functions quite well as a tank in that her skills lead her to being in the middle of fights, so she draws the focus of the enemy team and can still survive while your team cleans up.

Neither buy {{champion:266}}!
But if i had to chose get Vi.
